argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psgnfitr.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` N ) |
| 2 |  | psgnfitr.p | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | psgnfitr.t | |- T = ran ( pmTrsp ` N ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. B ) -> Q e. B ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_sygbasnfpfi | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. B ) -> dom ( Q \ _I ) e. Fin ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( pmSgn ` N ) = ( pmSgn ` N ) |
| 7 | 1, 6, 2 | #P_psgneldm | |- ( Q e. dom ( pmSgn ` N ) <-> ( Q e. B /\ dom ( Q \ _I ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. B ) -> Q e. dom ( pmSgn ` N ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 3, 6 | #P_psgneu | |- ( Q e. dom ( pmSgn ` N ) -> E! s E. w e. Word T ( Q = ( G gsum w ) /\ s = ( -u 1 ^ ( # ` w ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ Q e. B ) -> E! s E. w e. Word T ( Q = ( G gsum w ) /\ s = ( -u 1 ^ ( # ` w ) ) ) ) |
